description: This Python source file defines a class `SchemaLoader` responsible for loading and caching an OpenAPI schema from a URL or local file, with fallback mechanisms and cache management.

classes.name: SchemaLoader
classes.description: A class that loads, caches, and provides access to an OpenAPI schema from either a URL or a local file, with fallback mechanisms and optional reloading.

methods.name: __init__(self, url: Optional[str], local_path: str, session: Optional[requests.Session] = None)
methods.description: Initializes SchemaLoader with optional URL, local file path, and an optional requests session.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] load_schema(self)
methods.description: Attempts to load the schema from the URL if provided; otherwise falls back to the local file. Sets a default schema if both fail.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_schema(self)
methods.description: Returns the current schema, loading it if it hasn't been loaded yet.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] reload(self)
methods.description: Forces a reload of the schema from source, updating the cache.
